Regular Expressions

09 Jan 2017

PHP’s Regular Expressions Support

  • PHP’s Regular Expressions Support(github-regex.php)

Character Sets

  • /[w]{3}/ /[w]{3,5}/ /[w]*/ /[w]+/ /[w]?/ /www\.([^\.]+)/

Greediness

  • /@(\w+)/ <a href="https://www.dniya.com/$1">$1</a> [a-zA-Z0-9_]

Lookaheads and Lookbehinds

  • /google(?=<)/i /google(?!<)/i (?=string) (?!string) (?<=string) (?<!string)
$string = '$name = "Dniya"; My name is Dniya.';

$result = preg_replace('/(?<=\$)name/', 'VARIABLE', $string);

var_dump($result);

Link

  • RegExr is an online tool to learn, build, & test Regular Expressions (RegEx / RegExp): https://regexr.com/

  • A live regular expression tester for PHP: http://www.phpliveregex.com

  • https://regexper.com
